name: David´s Fabulous Waffles
ingredients: 3 medium size eggs or 2 jumbo eggs
Whipped Cream (preferably homemade with vanilla and cognac or bourbon mixed in)
instructions: Mix dry ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl with electric egg beater.
Separate the eggs, putting the whites and yolks in separate bowls
Whip the egg whites until almost stiff
Add buttermilk, melted butter, vanilla, to the egg yolk bowl.
Mix thoroughly with beater on low.
Add egg yolk bowl ingredients to the dry ingredients and beating on slow until fairly smooth.
Add a bit more buttermilk if it doesn’t fall right off the beater.
Add the egg whites and beat slowly but not too thoroughly.
Let sit for 5 mins before using.
Serve with whipped cream, maple syrup, sliced strawberries and blueberries.
